articles.title: Kevin Hart's Northern Ireland based movie released on Netflix - BBC.com
articles.description: Ulster University, Titanic Hotel and the Crown bar in Belfast are among the movie's locations.
articles.content:
Kevin Hart is one of the most successful comedy actors in Hollywood
The new Kevin Hart movie Lift, filmed largely in Northern Ireland, has been released on Netflix.
The US comedian spent a few mont… [+3170 chars]
